General.Name: CDN Maverick Capital Corp
General.Description: CDN Maverick Capital Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties. The company holds a 100% interest in the Rainbow Canyon Gold property situated in the Washoe County, Nevada, the United States. It also has an option to acquire 100% interest in the Nevasca Lithium Project covering an area of approximately 2842 hectares located in Salar de Arizaro, Argentina. The company was formerly known as Caelan Capital Corp. and changed its name to CDN Maverick Capital Corp. in November 2020. CDN Maverick Capital Corp. was incorporated in 1969 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 555 West Hastings, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 4N6
